author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In the realm of Yankee trade, rises the bond's mighty blade,
Nordea speaks- predictions bleak, the Fed's reprieve hath made.
Yields may mount a step beyond our ken, a bit more to abrade,
A forge of finance, smoldering, where fortunes are remade.

The metal gods, their bounty shed, upon the market's altar,
Though winds of want do howl and rant, their might doth never falter.
In Mainland's shadowed firmament, sees BMI the psalter,
Gold retreats, while base conceits, in London's light, do halter.

In the East, where dragons feast, shares tumble in despair,
Goldman Sachs prophesies on tracks, of markets bared and bare.
Beijing's balm, in uncertain palm, fails to clear the air,
As in the hearts of those who dart, there breeds a somber care.

feedItems.title: Long US Bond Yields Could Rise a Bit More, Nordea Says
feedItems.description: Long Treasury yields might have room to rise a little higher from current levels as the Fed might not have finished interest-rate rises, Nordea said.

feedItems.title: Metal Prices Set to End Week Higher Despite Demand Headwinds
feedItems.description: Base metals prices were higher while gold slipped in early London trade, and BMI said “a modest demand recovery in Mainland China in the coming months will support gains in base metal prices.”

feedItems.title: China Shares End Lower Amid Downbeat Investor Sentiment
feedItems.description: Chinese shares ended lower amid downbeat investor sentiment. Beijing’s easing measures “have not been sufficiently robust to neutralize downside risk in the property market nor to stabilize consumer and investor confidence,” Goldman Sachs said.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Harken, folk, to Saudi's noble quest,
In the Kingdom's game of power, none rest.
With Beijing's pledge, the scales they tilt,
A nuclear marvel, from sand to silk.

Sadly the price of oil falters low,
Despite OPEC's restraint, the profits slow.
Uncertainty cloaks the demand's path,
In the hush of the market, we feel the wrath.

China calls, with tender breaks of tax,
On the housing market, buyers relax.
In effort to lift the downturn's gloom,
For new homes, old ones create room.

feedItems.title: Saudi Arabia Eyes Chinese Bid for Nuclear Plant
feedItems.description: Beijing’s offer gives Riyadh leverage in talks with Washington on proliferation.

feedItems.title: Oil Set for Weekly Loss
feedItems.description: Oil prices ticked higher in Europe but were on course for a weekly loss as concerns about easing supply tightness and a cloudy demand outlook have outweighed reduced OPEC output.

feedItems.title: China Offers Tax Breaks to Home Buyers
feedItems.description: China’s finance ministry unveiled tax breaks for people who sell their homes and repurchase another within a year, a move that could push more homeowners to upgrade their housing as the property downturn continues.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Upon market's dance floor, shift doth rove,
Dollar, the snail, its strength to prove.
Drives growth, rabbit 'gainst euro dove,
As season changes in treasure trove.

The wolf named Heineken, sells with grace,
His business in Russia, for price base.
In the hands of Arnest, it finds a place,
Carlsberg stands, assets erased.

contract weaves the spider lace,
Ericsson and Huawei, in embrace.
Patents cross, in shared space,
In wisdom of technology's chase.

feedItems.title: Dollar Has Potential to Firm Against Euro in 3Q
feedItems.description: The dollar has scope to strengthen against the euro in the current quarter, driven by growth divergence between the U.S. and the eurozone economies, SEB said.

feedItems.title: Heineken Sells Russia Business…for $1
feedItems.description: The deal with Russia’s Arnest Group comes after Moscow seized the local assets of Danish beer rival Carlsberg.

feedItems.title: Ericsson and Huawei Renew Licence Deal
feedItems.description: Ericsson has renewed a multiyear global patent cross-licensing pact with Huawei, giving both companies access to each other’s patented, standardized technologies.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
From recession's well, pulls Germany out,
With second quarter spawn of sturdy stout,
Now economic vines are sprouting stout,
In the grapes of growth, there's nary a doubt.

Young Ramaswamy, in his thirty-eighth year,
Against Trump, he brandishes debate's spear,
Yet, a mighty alehouse strategy is unclear,
In the game of thrones, the crown draws near.

Oh, woe to Lahaina, kissed by flame,
Through Hawaiian Electric, comes a fiery claim,
Ale dark as night, tastes of sorrow and shame,
In trial by fire, there's much to tame.

feedItems.title: Germany Exits Recession as Economy Stabilises
feedItems.description: Germany left its recession behind in the second quarter, after new data confirmed preliminary results that the economy stalled in the three months to June, but didn’t contract.

feedItems.title: Vivek Ramaswamy, the 38-year-old political novice, grabbed the spotlight at the first GOP presidential debate, but there was little sign he or other contenders had found a new strategy for overtaking front-runner Trump.
feedItems.description: Vivek Ramaswamy, the 38-year-old political novice, grabbed the spotlight at the first GOP presidential debate, but there was little sign he or other contenders had found a new strategy for overtaking front-runner Trump.

feedItems.title: Maui County filed a lawsuit  against utility company Hawaiian Electric, alleging that its power lines caused recent wildfires on the island---including one that destroyed the town of Lahaina and killed at least 115 people.
feedItems.description: Maui County filed a lawsuit against utility company Hawaiian Electric, alleging that its power lines caused recent wildfires on the island—including one that destroyed the town of Lahaina and killed at least 115 people.
